nodes.caption:
Life would be amazing if all of us were the 'perfect' kind of people who have nothing but love to give, nothing bad to say and overall just 'pure' human beings.
As much as we would love to believe ourselves and others to be pure, we are fools and twisted souls. We make mistakes, and due to these, harboured deep within us are feelings of guilt, helplessness and defeat.
None of us are pure. 
We love to play the innocent, but are we really?

We've all said and done things that we didn't mean, in the heat of the moment or otherwise. 
We've said things which could've been framed better. 
We've been the cause of someone's tears and sadness too. 
We have hurt people and let them down, be it family, friends or lovers.
We have done things we promised we never would, and felt the bitter feeling of regret. 
We have done things we could never tell anyone, the very thought of the words and deeds brings about a stabbing pain in us.
We have lied and been selfish, inconsiderate, insensitive and all of the things we accuse others of being.

But, what will make you different is your effort and want to be a better person. To accept your mistakes and be humble enough to apologise. To not repeat the same mistakes, and to be better than we were. 
It will take time, patience and lots of effort, but it is what will make you different. 
Your ability to accept your mistakes, however grave they are, and working on being a better person is what ultimately makes you human.🌻
.
..
...
#instamusings #instawriter #writer #coorg #travel #traveldiaries #acceptance #life #positivity #positivevibes #goodlife

#wellnesswednesday There is this idea that everyone who eats smoothie bowls is vibrant and happy all the time! Social media can portray these types of images which I think can send a dangerous message. .
.
I had someone once make a comment how "I should never be tired because I always drink green smoothies", followed by a wink 😉. Like the suggestion that my eating habits must not be working cause I expressed I was tired that day. .
.
Regardless of what you eat, you can have days where you feel tired, sick, or bummed out. . 🥗Good nutrition gives our body the raw materials it needs to keep immune function up and our body more tools to work with. However, stress, shifts in hormones, seasonal weather changes, or a fight with your loved one that morning all creates a stress response in the body that then impacts our immune system, energy, and mood. 
So it's ok to not be ok all time, we are all human and have better days than others. 
On your low days listen to your body and give it what it needs. This could be a relaxing bath, hitting the gym, or a enjoying a piece of dark chocolate 🍫. Accept its ok not to be ok all the time, listen to what your body needs, and support yourself to feel better in the way that makes the most sense to you ❤️
.
.
#selfcare #selflove #meditation #affirmations #yoga #relaxation #wholefoods #nutrition #love #loveyourself #takeiteasy #emotion #wellnesscoach #wellnesswednesday #nutrition #holisticliving #holistichealth #women #momblogger #compassion #acceptance #understand #listentoyourheart #food4thought #motivationalquotes

We often seek love through a lover. 
Yet, how would we know if we found what we do not know. 
We often seek affection through companionship. 
Yet, in it's root, companion means to share. 
How can we share what we have not even granted our self. 
Through the law of attraction,
that which we are we receive.
That until we retrieve our higher self and self knowing. To do so we must conceive the idea of a greater knowing self which gives us a greater self knowing thusly greater self appreciation and love.
The concept of god is one that is androgynous, representing balance. 
The feminine nature to receive, concieve. 
The masculine nature to give and retrieve. 
As well as a symbol of self generation. 
We do not make love. We are made of it. We are that love, we are our own love child, our own partner in this love shaping. 
Until we are our own companion we may never truly know, therefore appreciate, a lover. 
#love #lovers #divine #androgyny #acceptance #god #goddess #union #selflove #selflovequotes #selfhelp #selfhate #naturals #healing #morningthought #thoughts #esoteric #selfie #self #relationshipgoals #relationshipcoach #women #men #healthyrelationships #relationshipgoals #creationship

Not a good day today. 
I've over done it this week, and am really paying for it today. It still surprises me how difficult I find it to listen to my body. Even after all the lessons I've learned and all I've been through. 
I'm 17 years into life with ME/CFS now, it's been at different levels of severity throughout those years (my story is over on my blog for any of you who want to read it). Some years severe to the point of being unable to sit up/care for myself, other years have been much better to the point of believing I was almost recovered. 
During the last couple of years, things have been tough, and generally all over the place, due to various infections and then other factors including a thyroid condition and endocrine system issues complicating things and setting me back. 
At the moment I am really struggling with getting real about where I am actually at and pace myself in the way that my body desperately needs me to. It can be so disorientating living inside a body that doesn't match up to the energy and life that you feel is in your soul. 
There's still this determined part of me, the part with such a passion for life, that kind of thinks 'ah I'll be okay' and try to push through, but as any of you with this condition will know, its not as simple as that! 
I had three days where I went out this week despite my symptoms rapidly increasing. By yesterday my body was literally screaming at me, and by last night I could barely move. You know that level of unbearable crushing fatigue where you feel like your body is shutting down? 
Today, is about getting real about where I am at in my journey. Not trying to forcefully change that. Aiming for some level of peace with that. Letting myself cry when I need to. Drinking lemon and ginger tea and listening to the rain outside whilst resting under a blanket on my sofa. 
On days like this all we can do is rest, be kind ourselves and find comfort in the little things. 
_________________________
#lessons #mecfs #cfs #autoimmune #thyroid #adrenals #chronicillness #toughdays #honest #candle #rain #peace #acceptance #healing #blogger #hbloggers

Life is a journey. ⛵💕 How do you feel on the ride?

Many times we live as though the destination and speed were everything there was to life. But that is no living.

Breathe. Relax for a moment.

The world will continue to turn if you take a moment and simply relax.

Take it in where you are. Where are you are today is likely a place with many things you prayed for in the past.

Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is all you have.

Enjoy it. 💕
.
-----
@lifeofpossible
-----
.
.
.
.
.

Imagine how beautiful existence would be if spirit and physical were balanced and harmonized.. to understand fear and ego and transmute it into creation and truth. The unseen has a vast amount of energy that forms our current reality directly through individual and mass consciousness. The spirit guides as we take action in our day to day moment to moment lives. Have more faith in the process and don't concern your self with control but give it up to the higher self, the higher mind. The lower monkey/ego mind loves to take control and be fearful and flood the mind with distracting thoughts if allowed, attune the monkey to the higher vibrations and watch how spirit leads you to your most desired states of being.  #find #your #truth #consciousness #inner #awareness #peace #harmony #light #Love #truth #ebbandflow #give #helpful #frequencies #compassion #acceptance #dimensions #new #realities #existence #balance #soul #growth #ASCENSION

I used to be embarrassed of my wide-set hips and the way my stomach formed too many rolls of skin whenever I sat down. When I was younger I hated how large my breasts were, how they weighed me down and changed my posture, and the way they stretched my skin. I would look at myself in the mirror and tell myself how ugly my smile was, I despised the way my teeth protruded outward, the gaps between my teeth and that they didn't align up perfectly straight. I hated that I didn't have the same features as my friends, and I hated that in the eyes of society, I was ugly. I felt ugly. I told myself I was ugly all the time, for a long time. I tried everything I could to change what I was and how I looked. I wanted to be anything other than myself. Our culture has conditioned us to believe that we have to maintain our bodies in a certain manner to be accepted, to be beautiful, and even to be loved. It's all a load of shit. How I look, or how my body is shaped does not define the amount of love that I deserve. 👑 ...Read the rest of this blog on body acceptance at riseofthewoman.com #riseofthewoman #bodyacceptance

Okay so, I decided to take a step out of my comfort zone and smile wITH TEETH AARGHh. 
Those of you who don't know, I'm self conscious about my teeth and my smile- I took quite a few photos to actually pick two that looked 'normal' and 'nice' because I'm scared of what others would think. 
Although, it is just a smile. :') 💜
I'm proud of myself for actually doing this. I highly dislike my teeth and smile, and would sometimes hide it when I was growing up- now that I'm being more positive, it's time to accept it. 💜 -
-
-
I had to look away from the camera when smiling because I looked pretty derpy. 😂
————————————————————————

If you knew that every person you have ever met, have ever loved or admired, has struggled with their own self doubt and feelings of worthiness, how might that change your feelings about yourself? Understand that self doubt is not a personal problem but something you have in common with all of humanity. That and love. ❤️💜💙💚💛💖Your choice 😊

'I am a lover of what is, not because I'm a spiritual person, but because it hurts when I argue with reality'
@byron.katie .
In the last 48 hours, the super power "acceptance" came up a bunch. .
Accepting what is feels better than resisting what is. 
Accepting ourselves feels better than criticizing ourselves.
Accepting others as they are, feels better than trying to manipulate or judge them into fitting some version of what we think we need to feel better.
.
All of it are choices we have available anytime, anywhere.
.
Now, what's really at the core is the decision, commitment, and blisscipline to feel good. So if your belief system tells you that life is meant to be hard, that you don't deserve to feel good, or that feeling good is superficial or narcissistic, then acceptance is going to feel wrong to you. As it always comes down to perspective and beliefs.
.
And I invite you to compassionately observe the perspective, thoughts and beliefs you accept as true for you, your life, and everything in it.
.
A thought is just a thought and can be changed.
A belief is just a thought we keep thinking.
And we are not the thoughts we think.
As none of them are permanent and all can be changed, lost, or questioned.
.
When you want peace, reach for the willingness to accept this moment, and everything in it fully.
.

#peace #consciousness #acim #empowerment #meditation #acceptance #loa #shift #lovingwhatis

Today, Wednesday May 17th marks the International Day Against Homophobia Transphobia and Biphobia. .
.
As a #teacher, I make sure that my students know the value of oneself, #selfcare, #selflove and know the value of #inclusion #respect #gratitude #mindfulness etc. We have a motto in our classroom and it is "In our class, no one is left alone, left behind and left out." .
.
.
As an advocate for social justice, a #radio co-host @coopradio and a board member of Pinoy Pride Vancouver, I along with @labeatnik and other co-hosts, we bring our audience/listeners inside the colourful world and vibrant lives of #LGBTQ + members and allies in #Canada. The show Pinoy Rainbow, a segment of Jeepney Cafe, tackles LGBTQ+ related issues and aims to raise the profile of its members. The show promotes #acceptance #inclusivity , #diversity, and #tolerance within the #Filipino #Canadian #Community. . Tune in every first Saturday of the month at 100.5 FM CFRO (5-6 PM). We hope to hear from you all. .
.
#pinoy #vancouver #vancity #dailyhivevan #gay #lesbian #trans #transinclusion #transequality #bisexual #straight #equality
